Discover The Spanish Capital With A Range Of Experience Programmes At Hotel Ritz, Madrid
Hotel Ritz, Madrid is offering guests a selection of Experience Programmes that reveal the Spanish capital’s attractions, both world-renowned and offbeat. Available until December 30th, all four packages include accommodation in the guest’s chosen room category, private airport transfer with chauffeur, Ritz continental breakfast and welcome treats. The four packages include:
Art Experience package for arts lovers. Two nights. Rates from €995, which includes:
Superior Room Tickets for the Prado, Thyssen-Bornemisza and Reina Sofía museums for two persons Hotel Ritz Afternoon Tea in the Hall or hotel garden A three-course dinner at Goya Restaurant, including wine recommended by our sommelier Art Guide to the Prado Museum Welcome kit, containing information about museums, gastronomy, cultural events, shopping, surrounding countryside, heritage cities, etc.
Madrid Experience package for discovering the city. Four nights. Rates from €2,605, which includes:
Superior Room Two tickets for a VIP Tour of the Bernabéu Stadium, home of football’s legendary Real Madrid. Tickets to Prado and Thyssen-Bornemisza museums. Three-hour walking tour of historic “Habsburg” Madrid. Hotel Ritz Afternoon Tea in the Hall or hotel garden. “Dalitini” cocktail tasting. The art of mixology inspired by the great Surrealist. Five-course degustation dinner, with Spanish wine pairing, in Goya Restaurant. Dinner at Botín, which is listed in the Guinness Book of Records as the world’s oldest restaurant. Flamenco dance class.
Family Experience package for family fun. Two nights. Rates from €1,455, which includes:
Deluxe room for two adults and one child under 12 years Optional second guestroom at 50% reduced rate Family dinner with wine recommended by our Sommelier at Goya Restaurant. Children can create their own menu with our Chef and enjoy complimentary ice cream Children’s bathrobes, slippers and bathroom amenities Evening treats on turndown PlayStation game consoles in guestroom Selection of age-appropriate children’s DVDs in guestroom Three tickets to Micropolix, Faunia or Warner Bros. Park Three tickets and looking for “Ritzy’s friends” game in Prado Museum Visit to Naval Museum
Romantic Experience package for couples. Two nights. Rates from €985, which includes:
Superior Room Three-course dinner of guest’s choice from a la carte menu with wine recommended by our sommelier at Goya Restaurant, Romantic turndown Sweet temptations afternoon snack tasting with a large selection of cakes
Except for the Family Experience package, all rates are for two persons sharing. Rates vary according to the guest’s room choice. Packages are subject to availability.
Source:- Mandarin Oriental
